TextLibrary.Text: Well done, kid. I knew you had it in you.
Well done, kid. I knew you had it in you.
For a biological entity, you are... almost competent.
For a biological entity, you are... almost competent.
Pezt can loot the Gamma Sphere? Now please?
Pezt can loot the Gamma Sphere? Now please?
You have restored the balance. I will have such a story to tell when I return to Quesada.
You have restored the balance. I will have such a story to tell when I return to Quesada.
I will have a story too, but sadly no home to return to after this. The MRI will take neither of us back.
I will have a story too, but sadly no home to return to after this. The MRI will take neither of us back.
Everyone is celebrating, and I too am glad. But, with the exception of a few who are scattered throughout the galaxy, my children are gone.
Everyone is celebrating, and I too am glad. But, with the exception of a few who are scattered throughout the galaxy, my children are gone.
No... you are not. You do what is necessary. I understand. I am not sorry either. Just... very lonely.
No... you are not. You do what is necessary. I understand. I am not sorry either. Just... very lonely.
